programme.title: Sell This House!: Lutz, FL
programme.desc: Ralph and Peg have been trying to sell their sprawling lakeside home outside of Tampa, Florida for over a year with no offers. As art teachers, they have a flair for creativity and their home is a hodge podge of every design idea they've ever had. Some rooms feel dated and stuffy with too many faux flower arrangements and antiques, while others oddly feature an English bar and Vegas-style slot machine! Ralph and Peg have run out of luck and they desperately need someone to teach them a lesson in staging. Watch as Designer Roger Hazard transforms their home into the updated living space that it should be using a few contemporary pieces of furniture and Ralph and Peg's artistic skills. Tanya Memme hosts.

programme.title: Sell This House!: Woburn, MA
programme.desc: Bill & Stephanie bought their house in Boston's suburbs with some friends, split it down the middle and set about to remodel the interior. Although there are some nice features in the home, there are some questionable color choices--giving the home no cohesive flow, some furniture design issues, and a whole lot of clutter. Stephanie's uncle is an art dealer in the area, so they have lots of interesting art, but it may be scaring away potential buyers. Now they're looking to sell their half of the duplex. Design and staging expert Roger Hazard is on the job. He sets out to add more flow to the home, designs a proper dining room, and comes up with a clever solution for oddly placed windows in the master bedroom. He also turns an upstairs storage room into a beautiful home office. Tanya Memme hosts.

programme.title: Sell This House!: Clearwater, FL
programme.desc: Jason's girlfriend loves the bachelor but hates his pad! He's been trying to sell his four bedroom home in Clearwater, Florida for over six months with no offers. It's a classic bachelor pad, complete with Nagel prints and swords adorning the walls. As a magician, he has a designated "Magic Room" which has really made buyers disappear! Watch as Designer Roger Hazard uses his magic to turn this house into a gorgeous beach bungalow designed to sell. Tanya Memme hosts.

programme.title: Sell This House!: West Orange, NJ
programme.desc: Wally, Laura and their son Allen, live in the bedroom community of West Orange, New Jersey, just a short commute from New York City. Homes in this hot market typically sell within a month, but so far, they've had no offers! The families looking to buy in this area are young and unfortunately the Salley house dates itself with stuffy wallpaper and lots of antique furniture and furnishings that look like they belong at Grandma's house. Staging expert Roger Hazard adds a modern touch that will appeal to buyers in the area. He transforms a dining room into a contemporary eating area, gives the feminine master bedroom a neutral makeover, and reinvents a cluttered bonus room into an inviting, important space. Tanya Memme hosts.

programme.title: Sell This House!: Austin, TX
programme.desc: Linda has been living in her house for nearly twenty years.

programme.title: Sell This House!: Jersey City, NJ
programme.desc: Arthur and Katie are ready to retire and move on to a home in Arizona. They have had their two bedroom townhome on the market for over six months with no interest what so ever. The place is boring and very outdated. Buyers are turned off and don't even remember going through the house. Designer and staging expert Roger Hazard helps Arthur and Katie do a total home staging makeover. Roger removes over half their furniture and sends it off to storage. Painting the bland white walls with a new coat of paint along with a dark accent wall makes the place contemporary and a stand-out for buyers. Roger had our homeowners do several projects including artwork for the dining room wall. Their home sold the day after we left! And, as part of the deal, the buyers wanted Arthur and Katie's Masterpiece included.

programme.title: Sell This House!: Round Rock, TX
programme.desc: Scott and Heather are desperate to sell their house. Scott has accepted a job

programme.title: Sell This House!: Lawson, MO
programme.desc: Robby Stark is a sweet guy, but his house...lets just say it's not so sweet and definitely in no condition to sell. We're not sure if it's the carpet from the 80's

programme.title: Sell This House!: Yonkers, NY
programme.desc: Ray recently got married and it's time to say goodbye to his beloved bachelor pad. However, that's not so easy when he can't even get an offer! From the stark white walls

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: Meet the Couples
programme.desc: Catch up with Bridezilla couples on the brink of divorce- Tasha & Jeff, Blanca & Julian, Mai-Lee & Tomas, Sofia & Shaun and Gloria & Mark. From a sexless marriage to a wife that still competes with an ex.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: Booze and Breakdowns
programme.desc: Five explosive Bridezillas and their husbands, with marriages on the brink of divorce, arrive at Marriage Boot Camp. Dirty laundry is exposed and an alcohol fueled fight sparks a midnight standoff.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: Death or Divorce
programme.desc: Divorce court sends Shaun on a drunken bender which sparks a savage household brawl. Then, reluctant spouses get a reality check when a drill forces them to face the inevitable deaths of their loved ones.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: She Shot Her Husband!
programme.desc: An execution-style drill exposes the fatal flaws destroying each couple's marriage. A blow up over breakfast pushes Julian to his breaking point and Jeff finally cracks when a dark secret is exposed.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: Don't Touch My Woman!
programme.desc: Tempers flare at a pool party after spouses witness their mates interact with attractive strangers during a boot camp drill. Mark explodes in a jealous rage and Blanca goes berserk.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: A Maze and Confused
programme.desc: Spouses are thrown into a giant labyrinth to test their communication skills. Afterwards, couples expose the extensive damage fighting dirty has caused their marriages.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: Spouse Swap
programme.desc: Couples are forced to swap spouses and spend the night with someone new. Furious her husband Tomas has been paired with pretty Sofia, Mai-Lee's jealousy sends Tomas over the edge and ready to quit Boot Camp.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: Sex Is the Glue
programme.desc: Couples tackle their toughest sex and intimacy issues using puppets. Gloria tests Mark and Sofia reveals a bedroom secret that stuns the house.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: Leap or Die Frying
programme.desc: Blanca exposes Julian's dark secret, shocking the house. Couples are forced to make the ultimate sacrifice and jump two-stories from a burning building.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: The Lie Detector
programme.desc: Devastating lies are revealed when couples undergo a lie detector test. Julian is blindsided by Blanca's deception and destroys the house in a booze fueled rage. Shawn falls off the wagon.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas: Proposal or Disposal
programme.desc: The entire house erupts into a brawl after Shawn returns to the mansion drunk. Gloria pulls a knife and Sofia breaks her foot in the melee. The final ring ceremony is held and not every marriage survives.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars: Sex
programme.desc: The couples learn that Sex Day is not all fun and games when one person is caught Facetiming someone other than their partner. Soulja lets jealousy get the best of him, leaving Nia wanting to go home alone. And Lil' Mo wonders what is Karl hiding?

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars: Breaking Bad
programme.desc: After Karl was caught FaceTiming another woman, Lil' Mo demands answers. The couples are shook when special guests force them to confront their traumatic past. Drama erupts when Nia encounters Soulja's problem child.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars: Mo Honey, Mo Problems
programme.desc: The couples face a dangerous challenge in an ultimate test of sacrifice. An explosive blowup shakes Soulja and Nia to their core. Lil Mo gets revenge on Karl for FaceTiming another woman. Tiffany feels abandoned when Fizz stings her heart.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars: Lyin' Dirty
programme.desc: The couples sweat it out in the hot seat during a surprise lie detector test and deception is indicated. The stars hit the club for a single's night out where temptation strikes at every turn and someone gets caught in the act.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars: Re-lit or Quit
programme.desc: After 10 Days of Boot Camp, the couples must decide if they'll stay together or leave apart. Has Lil' Mo finally had enough of Karl's lies? Will Soulja Boy pop the question? And after Jessica's deception, will she and Shawne leave engaged or enraged?

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars: It Ain't All Gucci
programme.desc: Five of Hip Hop's hottest couples enter Boot Camp and exes reunite! The stars are blindsided when the VIP club flips into Divorce Court! Things pop off when shocking issues are exposed. Later, the couples are bombarded by an unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars: Drop It Like It's Hot
programme.desc: The stars go head-to-head over who's to blame in an epic rap battle. Nia drops a bomb on Soulja Boy and all hell breaks loose! The stars sweat it out in the hot seat when they are served a plate of their burning issues. A battle of the exes ignites.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars: Road Rage
programme.desc: The stars navigate the hazards of dominance. A controlling Soulja Boy drives Nia over the edge. Lil' Fizz and Tiffany take an unexpected turn. Waka Flocka and Tammy crash and burn over past issues of infidelity.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars: Hashtag Drama
programme.desc: The stars are put on blast when a surprise press conference digs up dirty laundry from their social media. Later, the couples are ambushed by a wife swap! Jealousy wreaks havoc over the house when old flames, Lil' Fizz and Nia, are reconnected.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars: Mazed and Confused
programme.desc: When a stressful communication drill fails, the doctors confront the smoking issue. Tiffany seeks answers from Fizz and Nia. Soulja Boy is left feeling under water. And a boot camper is caught on camera facetiming someone other than their partner.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 14 Chefs Compete" - Chef Ramsay wakes up the remaining chefs in the middle of the night and orders them to prepare a spaghetti dinner for hungry firefighters. The losers must wash and wax fire engines.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 13 Chefs Compete" - The contestants must craft perfectly proportioned sausages for celebrities Drew Lachey, John O'Hurley, Tom Green, Melinda Clarke, Christopher "Kid" Reid and Kristy Swanson.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 12 Chefs Compete" - The twelve remaining chefs must plan a gastronomic salute to a returning U.S. Marine. The losing team will have to clean and decorate for Tana Ramsay's party.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 11 Chefs Compete" - The remaining chefs must create three-course meals that only total 700 calories. The winners hit the beach with Olympic beach volleyball player Annett Davis.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 10 Chefs Compete" - The remaining chefs roll dice to determine which ingredients they will use for their challenge dish. The winning team earns a trip to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 9 Chefs Compete" - The nine remaining chefs take a blind taste test. The winners score a dinner date with Chef Ramsay in a pitch-black dining room where they can't see what they're eating.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 8 Chefs Compete" - The remaining chefs make crepes. The winners will dine at a French restaurant while the losers prepare for a French-themed dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 7 Chefs Compete" - Winter Olympic medalists Sasha Cohen and Jonny Moseley appear as guest judges. For this challenge, all ingredients must be sourced from Whistler, B.C.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 6 Chefs Compete" - The six remaining contestants must replicate the dishes that Chef Ramsay prepared for them. The winners will dine with season four winner Christina Machamer.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 5 Chefs Compete" - The challenge for each of the remaining contestants is to make a dish that looks as good as it tastes. Experts from "Bon Appetit" magazine help Chef Ramsay judge.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Sante Le Brea
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay travels to LA to inspect Sante La Brea. He discovers a financially strapped owner who isn't respected by his staff. And an incident that occurs in the eatery leads to a police visit.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Lido di Manhattan
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Lido di Manhattan, an Italian joint with an unsightly kitchen and inexperienced owner. He is so horrified that he shuts the place down temporarily.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Capri
programme.desc: While visiting the Eagle Rock area of Los Angeles, Chef Ramsay stops by Capri. This Italian restaurant is filthy, serves terrible food and is in disarray all thanks to a lazy set of twins.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Luigi's
programme.desc: In Anaheim, California, Chef Ramsay performs an extreme makeover on Luigi's. The Italian eatery faces management conflicts after the owner retires and leaves the business to his sons.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Charlie's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay pays Charlie's a visit. Located in La Verne, California, this Italian eatery suffers from a lackluster menu and outdated décor.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Nino's Italian Restaurant
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay travels to Long Beach, California to visit Nino's Italian Restaurant, where ownership has changed hands from a pleasant immigrant couple to their obnoxious son.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Revisited No. 5
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay returns to Lido di Manhattan, Anna Vincenzo's and Le Bistro to see if the owners have implemented his changes.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Pantaleone's
programme.desc: A Denver restaurant owner maintains that his pizza is the best in the city, but local residents actually prefer store-bought pies.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mangia Mangia (Part One)
programme.desc: An Italian restaurant in Woodland Park, Colorado is beset with problems, including an incompetent head chef and low morale among the staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mangia Mangia (Part Two)
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay suggests a few top-down changes to help Mangia Mangia survive.

programme.title: Hermanitas Calle
programme.desc: Las hermanitas Calle son dos mujeres humildes que dan todo por su familia, por su carrera artística y por un género musical que las baña de gloria y de fama, pero les arrebata gran parte de su infancia y toda su juventud. Nelly y Fabiola Calle se aferran a sus voces y se lanzan a posicionar la música popular, un género despreciado por emisoras y disqueras. Su vida no será fácil ya que serán obligadas a ser el sustento de su familia. De pequeñas sufrirán por cuenta de su papá y de adultas, por causa de sus maridos. Vivirán historias de abandono y desamor tan dramáticas como las letras de sus canciones. Su gran mérito es que arrancando desde abajo y con todo en contra, se aferran a su amor por la música y al poder desbordante de sus dos voces para lograr lo imposible: posicionar y venderle a la sociedad un género musical con el que pocos artistas alcanzan reconocimiento.

programme.title: Byron Trimble - Diary of a Short City Boy
programme.desc: Byron Trimble has traveled around the world doing comedy for conferences, churches, retreats, clubs, schools, and corporate events. He has been featured on NBC, ABC, Living Oklahoma, and the Dan Patrick Show. His hilarious blend of music and comedy in his live shows and the following generated by his online videos have enabled him to share the stage with nationally known comedians like John Crist and Anita Renfroe. Raised in Detroit, MI, he now lives in Tulsa, OK with his beautiful wife, Hannah, and three young children. Yet, he says his greatest success might be being a pastors kid his whole life and never being arrested.

programme.title: Kristin Key - Crafty
programme.desc: Kristin Key grew up a minister’s daughter in a small town in West Texas. Much like Footloose, she was raised in a no-drinking, no-dancing, no instrumental music environment. She seemed like any other well-behaved girl… until she opened her mouth. It was obvious from the beginning that she had a quick wit and undeniable sense of humor.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Dave Nihill - Documented
programme.desc: Dave is the winner of the prestigious 43rd annual San Francisco Comedy Competition, and runner up in the Moth’s largest US Grandslam storytelling competition.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: K-Von - Designer Muscles
programme.desc: Half-Persian and raised in a religious family, K-Von's comedy unites sharp cultural riffs with clean delivery. In this special he takes on political correctness, cyber bullying, and the utility of cargo pants.

programme.title: Chad Thornsberry - Junk-Cars & Valet Parking
programme.desc: Chad Thornsberry was born in St. Louis, MO. From an early age he learned his family was blessed, and blessed him with humor, quick wit, and a love of storytelling. Chad’s unique comedic perspective awards audience the opportunity to laugh at the common occurrences in everyday life. Often referred to as a great writer, his straightforward style allows audiences to laugh with him and at him as they find the humor in themselves. With reflections on growing up in a trailer park and observations as an English teacher, Chad’s satiric insights look at the pitfalls that make us human. With smart humor and a conversational style, Chad has delighted audiences from the trailer park, throughout the Midwest, and from coast to coast.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Seth Tippetts - Tall. Dark. Gigante
programme.desc: Get to know Seth from the chest down. He’s big, he’s tall, but most of all he’s hilarious. Check out this Utah-raised, clean, and semi-professional comedian today!

programme.title: James Johann - Rurally Funny
programme.desc: James' childhood upbringing was significantly influenced by country music, countless bad hair cuts, and Catholic school. In 1991, James began his stand-up career in Kansas City. Today, James is a long-time veteran of the stand-up comedy circuit, performing at clubs across the country. His self-deprecating sense of humor and high energy style come together to create a unique onstage persona. James relies more on his brain than the profane and his comedy is a truthful and hilarious reflection of life as he sees it.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jeff Jena - Old Dog, New Jokes
programme.desc: Jeffrey Jena is one of the top corporate and cruise comics working today. His thirty-three years of live performance experience and over forty national television shows, both as an actor and comic give him the ability to work for any audience

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Aaron Woodall - Sad and Needy
programme.desc: Between his first and second special, Aaron Woodalls perspective transitioned from a nice young man coming to grips with a dirty, cynical world to a deeper introspection of his own upbringing and biases.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Tom Ryan - Off The Verge
programme.desc: Over the years Tom Ryan has worked steadily at comedy clubs, concert venues, corporate functions and colleges across the U.S.. He has also made national television appearances on Showtime, A&E Comedy Central, and… Three times on “The Late Show with David Letterman!”. He has performed as the opening act in concert for: B.B. King, Tim Allen, Steven Wright, Natalie Cole, and Dennis Miller just to name a few. He has contributed monologue jokes to the award winning "Politically Incorrect with Bill Maher" and regularly headlines corporate events for companies ranging from Coca-Cola to Church and Dwight. Tom believes that the best comedy comes from the most unlikely sources.

programme.title: Tom Clark - I'm A Rescue
programme.desc: Tom Clark was born and raised, in that order. Clark’s mix of well-crafted jokes and spontaneous crowd work has led to appearances on TBS’s ‘Conan,’ CBS’s ‘Late Late Show, and Comedy Central’s ‘Premium Blend’. Clark has traveled coast to coast doing stand up and has performed internationally as part of New Faces at the prestigious‘Just For Laughs Comedy Festival’ in Montreal and on The Main Stage at ‘The Capetown Comedy Festival’ in South Africa. Clark is also an actor and has appeared on such shows as NBC’s ‘Outsourced’, TNT’s ‘The Closer’,and the Hallmark made for TV movie ‘The Wish List’. After landing the role on ‘Outsourced,’ director Ken Kwapis invited Clark to be in the Drew Barrymore movie, ‘Big Miracle’. You can also see Clark in Columbia Pictures ‘Freaks of Nature.’

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Paul Morrissey - A Real Humdinger
programme.desc: Paul was raised as a sports fanatic in the tiny town of Owego, in upstate New York. After four years of playing college basketball, somehow he graduated. Aside from playing in the NBA, his dream job was to talk about sports for a living. Paul then moved to California after landing a television sports anchor job but found out quickly that he was “too much of a smart-ass” for TV news. After he was fired, Paul took his unique sense of humor to comedy club stages all over the country. In 2005, Paul was selected to perform at the HBO Comedy Festival in Las Vegas. Morrissey has also been a finalist in several national comedy competitions including Wendy’s Comedy Challenge, Comedy Central’s Open Mic Fight and Maxim’s Real Men of Comedy.

programme.title: Rik Roberts - Put Down the Sweet Tea
programme.desc: Rik Roberts brings a little bit of Nashville everywhere he goes. From quick bits about family and technology, to surprising stories about marriage and music – you’ll find something you can relate to. Growing up in Kentucky, he got his hands dirty working

programme.title: Day Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

programme.title: Greed Is Good? - Episode 202
programme.desc: When Jestro uses the Book of Greed to rob Auremville of its riches, he also gets Lance's parents as prisoners and these demanding rich folks are too much for even monsters to handle. Jestro's not sure what to do with his new castle in the Lava Lands. "Every castle needs a big chamber filled with treasure" says the Book of Monsters so they've got to go out looting! The BOM convinces Jestro to call forth GENERAL MAGMAR, and Jestro appoints him as "general manager" of "castle operations," much to Magmar's dismay. Meanwhile, Jestro and the BOM find the BOOK OF GREED. This will allow them to make greedy, rapacious monsters that will bring them all the treasure they want to fill their castle! They'll head to the richest town in the realm - AUREMVILLE! Meanwhile, in Auremville, the NEXO-Knights arrive for a huge "Gold is Good" ball at Lance's house. When the Monsters finally arrive in Auremville, a battle breaks out and the greedy monsters make off with everything...including Lance's parents, Goldie and Cuthbert Richmond who are clad in the finest golden garments and so look valuable! Lance will now be forced to live...poor. The Knights have to get his parents back. Meanwhile, his parents - Cuthbert and Goldie Richmond -think their imprisonment in Jestro's gold-filled castle is a "spa holiday" with the worst service. They order Magmar and the monsters around like servants and drive them all crazy. The Knights pile into the Fortrex and head for the Lava Lands, formulating a plan along the way to free Lance's parents. In a village half-way to Jestro's Castle, the Knights run into...Jestro and his monsters headed the other way with Lance's parents and all the gold they've stolen. There's a big fight, until they realize they might have the same goal and decide to deal. The BOM wants to give them back all the gold and Lance's parents. Lance says "No deal." "We'll take the gold, you can keep my parents." It's a weird and comical stand-off. Finally, Clay convinces Lance he has to take his parents back even if they don't always get along (and, it's the only way to get the gold back.)

programme.title: Darkness Shall Rise
programme.desc: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas come to realize that evil has started to resurface with Lord Garmadon forging the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers. With the Devourer destroyed, Ninjago is saved and the rebuilding effort begins. Without their Golden Weapons, the Ninja are stripped of their elemental powers. And with their flying ship 'The Destiny's Bounty' destroyed, the Ninja are forced to find a new home in the city. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon resurfaces and gains control of the Serpentine as well as transforms the Bounty's wreckage to become 'The Black Bounty'. The Ninja will battle Scales and discover evil has begun to resurface in Ninjago, while Lord Garmadon will successfully forge the Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession - Episode 203
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the "Knight-a-Kon" in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever "infiltration" mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro, the BOM and their monsters fit right in at the convention and Clay and crew have their work cut out for them trying to separate fiend from fan. Macy keeps going on-and-on about the story in the King's comic book as the Knights keep a watchful eye on it. Robin even shows up in the "Minitrex" - a small version of the Fortrex he built just for the Knight-a-Kon. He's convinced he can win the costume competition that is the big closing event for the Kon. At the end of the Kon there's a big awards ceremony for "Best Costume." The prize: "Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1." The BOM must get it and scheme to get closer to it during the costume contest. He's just...about...to get the book when...the impatient Magmar attacks! Everyone thinks it's part of the big show! "Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1" is tossed from person-to-person-to-person in the melee. The Knights must do something, but they're too far away from the Fortrex to download any NEXO-Power. Robin pulls up in his Minitrex they can use it to get NEXO-Power! Robin wins the best costume for his Minitrex and wins the Ned Knightly Comic which he then gives to Macy...she deserves to read it.

programme.title: The Drooling Detective - Episode 13
programme.desc: When ruthless dognappers steal Mia's dog Toffee from the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show, it's up to the Friends to play detective and track down the culprits, with the help of an unlikely hero: Stephanie's borrowed sad-sack bloodhound, Benchley. Andrea and her singing dog act, the Howlers, are a sure bet to win the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show - in spite of stiff competition from Tanya's dancing poodle, Olivia's Robo-Dog, and even Stephanie's sad-sack borrowed bloodhound, Benchley. But when an unscrupulous mother-and-son dog-napping team steals the Howlers' best singer, Mia's dog Toffee, it's up to the Friends to rescue him and catch the baddies with the help of the Hero Of The Day - Benchley!

programme.title: Pirates Vs. Ninja
programme.desc: When Garmadon by accident brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty - the ruthless Captain Soto and his Pirates - it is up to our ninjas to stop them from plundering Ninjago City. Sharing a tiny, one-bedroom apartment in the city, the Ninja take Lloyd to Grand Sensei Darreth's Mojo Dojo to begin training. There, they discover Lloyd has all four of their natural elemental abilities. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon discovers his Mega-Weapon can't destroy, only create what the user wishes. By accident, Garmadon brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty: Captain Soto and his Pirates, and they mutiny the ship. Answering the age-old question of who would win a fight between pirates and ninja, it's up to our ninja to stop Captain Soto and his men from plundering Ninjago City. In the end, Ninjago City is saved, the Pirates are arrested and Lord Garmadon escapes once again with their Black Bounty.

programme.title: The King's Tournament - Episode 204
programme.desc: Rival to the King, Jorah Tightwad thinks his knights - the Tighty Knighties - are easily better than the NEXO-Knights, so he challenges King Halbert to prove who's better during the King's Birthday Tournament. It's the King's birthday! To celebrate, the Queen and Macy always throw him a great, big birthday party consisting of a feast on birthday eve and a tournament the next day. At the birthday banquet is JORAH TIGHTWAD (last seen in episode 104.) He's goading the King (and on his birthday, even) and going on and on about how his knights are better than the NEXO-Knights. The King protests, but Jorah asks "How many magical books have your knights recovered? None, zilch, zero." But he produces the BOOK OF ENVY, which his superior knights captured from Jestro. The next day, the NEXO-Knights square off against Tightwad's four knights: JOUSTING BEEBER, BRICKNEY SPEARS, SHIA LABLADE and THE BLOK. We see that all these knights are envious of the NEXO-Knights: their weapons, their fame, their hair, etc. Macy is also disappointed to find out she CAN'T fight in the tournament - she's agreed to be in "princess mode" for her father's birthday. During the tournament, we see that Tightwad's knights are amazing in fighting contests. They all pair-off with knights who have their same weapons skills. Tightwad makes fun of the NEXO-Knights as his knights do well. Jestro and the Book of Monsters discover that Tightwad has the Book of Envy and he and his monsters attack the tournament. Then we learn that Tightwad's knights might be good tournament fighters, but they can't handle real fights and the NEXO-Knights must save them! Macy is finally able to join in the fight when she sees Magmar show up on the flank. The NEXO-Knights successfully defend the king, but Jestro gets away with the Book of Envy. Tightwad must admit his knights never won the book from Jestro he got the book when Merlok blasted books of magic across the realm. Tightwad's knights all admit that they really admire the NEXO-Knights.

programme.title: Rabbitouille - Episode 14
programme.desc: It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! Stephanie concocts a fabulous cake, and Sneaky Tanya steals the recipe -- but neither knows that pet bunny Daisy has added a secret key ingredient. Will Stephanie's frantic efforts to win at all costs end her friendship with her BFF's? It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! After the duo's rivalry brings Aunt Sophie's Adopt-A-Pet Fair to a disastrous end, a contrite Stephanie wants to make amends with the prize money from a TV Bake-Off show. At home, Stephanie practices baking a delicious cake, and Tanya steals the recipe. But neither girl knows that Stephanie's pet bunny has inadvertently added a secret ingredient, ensuring that no one can repeat the recipe. A frustrated Stephanie freaks out, nearly ending her friendship with the girls - until they discover the bunny's secret and race to help Stephanie win.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon's new Mega-Weapo. Realizing how to correctly wield the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates evil replicas of the Ninja to face off with our heroes. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are invited back the Darkly's Boarding School, only to discover it's a trap and now the bad kids have seized control of the school. With the Ninja trapped in the school with the faculty, things spiral out of control as the Evil Replica Ninja arrive. As an awesome battle takes place in the school halls, the Ninja manage to outsmart their evil versions, and warn Lord Garmadon they're ready for whatever else he throws at them.

programme.title: Monster Chef - Episode 205
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his "Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition" cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. "Hot chili makes hot monsters!" Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands - meaning Jestro's - could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. "Nope, not hot enough...waaaay too much garlic....you call that hot?!" (BELCH!)

programme.title: Change Of Address - Episode 15
programme.desc: When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. Naturally, everything that can go wrong does go wrong - especially when the entire house disappears! When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. But after fending off Andrea's party plans, a Home Alone-style break-in (by the hapless Snivel, trying to retrieve incriminating evidence of the Mayor's latest scheme), and finally the entire house disappearing ("Uh, think Stephanie's Mom will notice?"), Stephanie comes to appreciate that responsibility is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Ninjaball Run
programme.desc: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo. As Lloyd continues to train and unlock his hidden powers, the Ninja learn land developers are going to destroy Darreth's Mojo Dojo unless Darreth can find the money to save it. The Ninja decide to enter their Ninja Tank into the annual NinjaBall Run cross-country rally to try to win its cash prize. Revisiting past characters who also enter the race, the high-speed derby will only grow more dangerous as Garmadon enters his Black Bounty, realizing this is the perfect chance to use his Mega-Weapon and rid the ninja. In the end, the Ninja will discover a few secrets within their Ninja Tank, allowing them to beat Garmadon's Bounty by a millisecond and saving Darreth's Dojo with their well-deserved cash prize. And as a final surprise, the Ninja steal back the Destiny's Bounty and make it their own once again.

programme.title: Knight Out - Episode 206
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests then...more training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort "Exalted Towers" renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the "high class" resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are "off" at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to see...Jestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters - though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Dive In - Episode 16
programme.desc: Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends - until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. The Friends each try to help, with disastrous results. Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends - until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. He's Tad, the new lifeguard, and just the sight of him reduces the normally fearless Andrea to a babbling wimp. The Friends all try to help her out, with less-than stellar results, each attempt resulting in increasing mayhem for Tad until he's terrified of Andrea. Then Andrea discovers that she's been mooning over the wrong boy all along!

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to 'turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and turned into kids and are now forced to enlist Lloyd's help to battle the awakened monster. Tired of intense training, Lloyd yearns to play and enjoy his youth. The Ninja remind Lloyd that along with great power, comes great responsibility. When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to 'turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and soon discover they've been turned into kids! Seeking Lloyd's help and relying on childhood antics, the five ninja kids must destroy the reawakened monster that's hunting them in the city. In the end, Lloyd makes the difficult decision and sacrifices his youth in order to save them from the beast, turning forward the clock and turning Lloyd into a young man. Sensei Wu fears now that since Lloyd is young man, the final battle of good versus evil approaches sooner than he had ever expected.

programme.title: Saturday Knight Fever - Episode 207
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters catching a cold means trouble for the NEXO-Knights when he can create an entirely new kind of "snotty" monster. King and Queen Halbert have journeyed to the town of Cleanington to open the brand new Scrubbery Barn at the invitation of Roger the Scrubber (seen in 104.) Meanwhile, the Book of Monsters drags Jestro to Snottingham - one of the coldest places in Knighton where everyone coughs, has a runny nose and is generally under-the-weather. The BOM demands that Jestro feed him a "snotheiser" ball which will probably make him sick. The BOM explains that if he is sick, he may just produce a whole new breed of magical monsters ... some that the knights would NEVER expect. The BOM gets sick and starts coughing up phlegm globlins and bloblins. The Knights arrive, alerted to what they think is an attack on the town by Snottingham's mayor, Hack Coughmeier. The sickened, sneezy, snotty monsters infect the knights and, more importantly, the knights' NEXO-Shields. Now their NEXO-Powers are infected. As they try to download something to fight the monsters, they realize the powers they get are off strange, infected versions of their powers. The knights drive Jestro and his snot monsters off and they turn in for the night. And, overnight, they all get sick. Meanwhile, the BOM order a nice, hot lava bath...he'll feel fine by morning. But the knights wake-up with colds and they feel terrible. Ava and Merlok 2.0 thinks it will pass in a day or two...it's just a typical Snottingham cold. Each knight gets sick in their own funny way and their illnesses play right into Jestro and the BOM's hands: they're headed to Cleanington to kidnap the king! The citizens of the ultra-clean city hate the sight of monsters, but then feel caught in between when the sick, sneezy, snotty knights arrive on their Fortrex. The fight goes terribly for the knights. They try to download the Nexo-power "Glorious Griffon" but instead get just feathers. So they improvise and tickle the monsters! Ava finally comes up with a way to use some anti-virus tools on their NEXO-Shields and just as Jestro is about to take the king and queen away, the NEXO-Knights get their normal powers back! They defeat Jestro and save the king and queen.

programme.title: I Told You So - Episode 17
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her - till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit...

programme.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon. In his most villainous attempt at using the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates a vortex through space and time to return to the moment Wu first arrives to recruit Kai to become a ninja (Episode 1, 2011) in order to rid the ninja from the future. The Ninja follow him back in time, only to make the mistake in saving Nya from the Skeletons. Suddenly, Past Kai doesn't have a need to become a ninja, so our current day heroes must fix the past to save their futures. The stakes rise as Garmadon catches wind the Ninja have followed him back in time and plans a dangerous trap. In a final battle, the ninja use the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon, causing all of the legendary weapons to shoot off into the night sky. In the end, our heroes return back to the present and learn the Mega-Weapon has ceased to exist because it was destroyed in the past, leaving them all without their elemental powers.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight - Episode 208
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton - the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hear...laughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, "my monster is so fat" jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as "bouncers" to keep too many people out of the comedy club. ("Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.") The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. And...Jestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be bad...he is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages him...go on stage alone, be funny...he can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a "joke book" that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny - by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: "Where's my Jestro?!" Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest with...the Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: Snow Way - Episode 18
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all - the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Stone Army
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers. Lord Garmadon struggles controlling the Serpentine now that he is without the Mega-Weapon. His latest endeavor is to lead the snakes in search of a fabled Dark Island that ancient texts say holds dark powers. Unable to find the island, the furious Serpentine abandon Lord Garmadon out at sea. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are called to the museum to find the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has seeped into the ground beneath the city, and it's brought an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior to life! Our heroes come across Misako, Lloyd's long lost mother. She's an archeologist in search of stopping the prophesized battle between Lloyd and his father. She had unearthed the Stone Warrior, and shares how it was once part of an indestructible army created by a dark spirit named The Overlord. When the balance is altered and evil is let into Ninjago, it will allow the Overlord to return and bring darkness and destruction to the land. Unable to destroy the Terminator-like Stone Warrior, the Ninja cleverly trap it. In the end, Lord Garmadon awakens on a small island at sea and hears the voice of the banished Overlord, promising him his wildest dreams. Garmadon uses his four hands to activate a mechanism, raising a lost land from out of the sea, creating a Yin/Yang symbol with Ninjago. The ultimate battle between good and evil begins to unfold.

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious - Episode 209
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal to...Clay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some 'Master Plan." Suddenly, they realize Monsters - led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster - are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lance...finally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the books...and now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayal...the Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towards...the Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Larger Than Life
programme.desc: Bill Murray is the master of quirky characters, so it's little wonder that portraying a motivational speaker who inherits an elephant would be a natural fit. "Larger than Life" is madcap, screwball comedy fun at its best. Directed by Howard Franklin ("Quick Change"), "Larger Than Life" features a cast that includes Jeremy Piven ("Entourage"), Janeane Garofalo ("Touch"), Matthew McConaughey ("Dallas Buyer's Club"), and Linda Fiorentino ("Unforgettable").

programme.title: Back to School
programme.desc: Rodney Dangerfield plays self-made millionaire Thornton Mellon, owner of a chain of tall and fat clothing stores, who, after divorcing his philandering wife, enrolls in college to keep his son from dropping out. Rodney's invasion quickly turns the campus into a non-stop party zone, and he even helps the diving team win their big meet.

programme.title: Futureworld
programme.desc: Do you remember that disaster at Delos a few years ago when the "Westworld" robots went out of control and killed a few guests? Well, the entire resort has now been rebuilt and redesigned to be completely fail-safe. To combat lingering adverse publicity, the Delos corporation has offered two reporters (Peter Fonda, Blythe Danner) exclusive rights to the "new" Delos story. But as the reporters start their private tour, they get the feeling that the resort may not be as safe as Delos claims...

programme.title: Is Paris Burning?
programme.desc: The courage-filled story of the Allied Resistance and the Paris Liberation of 1944. As the Nazi jackboot marches through Europe, the freedom fighters of Paris mount a brave resistance.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A famous cat burglar who has retired to the Riviera catches a thief imitating his old style.

programme.title: Danger: Diabolik
programme.desc: The suave thief called Diabolik can’t get enough of life’s good – or glittery – things. Not when there are currency shipments to steal from under the noses of government officials and priceless jewels to lift from the boudoirs of the rich.

programme.title: Detective Story
programme.desc: Kirk Douglas stars as the rigid detective whose personal code has become twisted from dealing with too many criminals. Eleanor Parker is his wife, tormented by a guilty secret.

programme.title: Is Paris Burning?
programme.desc: The courage-filled story of the Allied Resistance and the Paris Liberation of 1944. As the Nazi jackboot marches through Europe, the freedom fighters of Paris mount a brave resistance.

programme.title: Wedding Planner Mystery
programme.desc: A young wedding planner is framed for a crime and struggles to clear her name as she learns that love does not always arrive in a pretty package. Stars Erica Durance, Andrew Walker and Brandon Beemer.

programme.title: Perfectly Prudence
programme.desc: Prudence MacIntyre is asked to make changes to her successful television show when the network sends in new producers to revamp her image. One of the producers is an old flame, and the other is a seedy womanizer.

programme.title: The Valley of Light
programme.desc: A World War II veteran returns home in search of a place to belong. Stars Chris Klein, Gretchen Mol, Zach Mills, Jay O. Sanders, Jeff Perry, Geoff Pierson, Stephen Tobolowsky and Robert Prosky. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: Two sisters embark on a journey of discovery and reconciliation in this poignant real-life story based on the memoirs of Margaret Moorman.

programme.title: Loving Leah
programme.desc: When Leah's husband Benjamin dies suddenly, Benjamin's brother Jake is stunned to learn he is expected to marry Leah to carry on the name. Jake suggests to Leah that they get married and maintain a secretly platonic relationship.

programme.title: The Sapphires
programme.desc: Four women become unlikely stars by singing for the troops in Vietnam with the help of an R&B-loving musician.

programme.title: Happythankyoumoreplease
programme.desc: A group of 20-something New Yorkers struggle to figure out themselves, their lives, and their loves.

programme.title: Soul Men
programme.desc: Two estranged soul-singing legends agree to participate in a reunion performance at the Apollo Theater.

programme.title: The Sapphires
programme.desc: Four women become unlikely stars by singing for the troops in Vietnam with the help of an R&B-loving musician.

programme.title: Mystery Team
programme.desc: Three teenage wannabe sleuths are given their toughest case yet one involving murder.

programme.title: All Summers End
programme.desc: Peer-pressured by his two best friends to prove they're more important than a girl, Conrad Stevens pulls an innocent prank that has a disastrous impact on the family life of his girlfriend, Grace Turner. Racked with guilt, Conrad tries to make up for his mistake by doing everything he can for Grace - except tell the truth. What began as innocent summer love suddenly transforms into something more real than either could have expected.

programme.title: Stonehearst Asylum
programme.desc: An Oxford grad (Jim Sturgess, "Across the Universe") accepts a job at a mental asylum and soon discovers that its "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane and horrific.

programme.title: Regresa
programme.desc: A woman in Mexico City has marital problems and goes to a therapist. She wakes up from hypnosis thinking she's a Basque princess from the 15th century. English Subtitled.

programme.title: Adventures in Public School
programme.desc: A socially awkward, home-schooled kid forces his way into public school against his suffocating but loving mother's wishes. Co-starring Judy Greer.

programme.title: Against the Clock
programme.desc: In this sci-fi thriller, a former CIA operative gets back into the field to find out what happened to her husband - but the CIA keeps getting in her way.

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: When five teens discover a machine that can send them back in time, the possibilities seem endless. But by changing the past, they have threatened the future of our world. Can they undo the damage they have unleashed before it’s too late?

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: In this tense apocalyptic thriller, five youths fight to survive after being stranded in Moscow during an alien attack.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: As Hunter and McCall investigate a string of jewelry store robberies, they pursue the thieves in an alley and McCall shoots a man who may be innocent.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: McCall can't believe that a doctor, a pregnant trauma specialist who once treated her, began drinking again and killed herself by driving off a cliff.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the murders of teenage prostitutes and the prime suspect is a sadistic killer who impersonates a cop.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall follow a string of torture murders to a money laundering ring and an undercover cop looking for his daughter.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the murder of an art gallery owner involved in illegal sales of indigenous artifacts and find themselves drawn into the world of Native American politics.

programme.title: Sea Patrol
programme.desc: An animal and a stowaway both cause trouble aboard the HMAS Hammersley.

programme.title: Sea Patrol
programme.desc: Spider goes undercover to expose a sex-slave racket operating off the Australian coast. Swain is forced to perform an emergency childbirth at sea when an illegal immigrant goes into early labour.

programme.title: Sea Patrol
programme.desc: Hammersley rescues a former Navy officer lost at sea - with shocking consequences for the crew. Mike and Spider are taken hostage during a shoot-out with weapons smugglers.

programme.title: Sea Patrol
programme.desc: A special bond is formed between a child in desperate circumstances and one of Hammersley's young guns.

programme.title: Deceitful Storm
programme.desc: This powerful drama about love, pain, deceit and betrayal reveals what can happen when people stop believing in God and take matters into their own hands. A dramatic twist and turn of events through abuse, neglect and infidelity lead to an explosive conclusion.

programme.title: Preaching to The Pastor
programme.desc: PREACHING TO THE PASTOR is a musical comedy about the controversy going on at High And Mighty Missionary Baptist Church. The Pastor has a dark secret that may cost him his title and his ministry. In the end, everyone needs to be preached to, including the Pastor.

programme.title: Traces of Indignity
programme.desc: Dr. Augusta Weber has traveled the world over promoting her books, DVD's and selling out public speaking events. She is a retired College Professor who is greatly admired by all. Although Dr. Weber is an advocate for being straight-forward, open and honest, she is protecting a deep, dark secret that has plagued her for years. An aggressive journalist, Ruby, is determined to denounce Dr. Weber's character by uncovering the truth and scoring the next big story.

programme.title: Saved By Grace
programme.desc: After being fired from her job, Grace Hightower applies for a position to work at the local church. Full of insecurity and self-doubt, her faith is tested when the church unexpectedly goes into foreclosure, forcing herself to find the courage to save it.

programme.title: Surprise Surprise
programme.desc: A socially-awkward, heavy-set college student conducts a Philosophy class experiment by conning his sexy, womanizing best friend into posing as "himself" to date a beautiful, charming woman from an online dating website. He's doing all this to prevent himself from losing his scholarship, and flunking out of school. Once the truth unfolds, he realizes it was a huge mistake. Watch as the hilarity unfolds in this wacky comedy.

programme.title: Book of Songs
programme.desc: High school dropout and aspiring musician, Mike, spends his days hanging out with his friends and confronting the members of the church next door. Most members have learned to keep their distance, but Sister Thomas is determined to open Mike's mind to GOD and religion. Connecting through a love for music she convinces Mike to pick up the Bible and start reading. He quickly learns that the Bible truly is a book of songs and slowly starts to believe in himself again. With the help of Sister Thomas, Mike stands up to his friends and begins to choose a more righteous path.

programme.title: Jules Verne's Mysterious Island, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan, Patrick Stewart, Gabrielle Anwar, Omar Gooding, Jason Durr, Danielle Calvert, Roy Marsden Escaping from a Confederate prison camp by balloon, five survivors land on an uncharted island in the Pacific. Far from a sanctuary, the island is home to carnivorous monsters, bloodthirsty pirates, and the mad genius, Captain Nemo, who inhabits the mysterious island for his own strange ends.

programme.title: Jules Verne's Mysterious Island, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan, Patrick Stewart, Gabrielle Anwar, Omar Gooding, Jason Durr, Danielle Calvert, Roy Marsden Escaping from a Confederate prison camp by balloon, five survivors land on an uncharted island in the Pacific. Far from a sanctuary, the island is home to carnivorous monsters, bloodthirsty pirates, and the mad genius, Captain Nemo, who inhabits the mysterious island for his own strange ends.

programme.title: Riot
programme.desc: Mario Van Peebles, Luke Perry, Lucy Liu, Dante Basco, Kieu Chinh, Alexis Cruz, Yelba Osorio, John Oritz, Douglas Spain Four real-life stories set against the backdrop of the 1992 Los Angeles riots intertwine to explore the shattering drama that changed the lives of everyone who experienced it.

programme.title: Pandemic, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Tiffani Thiessen, French Stewart, Faye Dunaway, Eric Roberts, Vincent Spano, Bob Gunton, Michael Massee When inexplicable flu-like symptoms kill a young man aboard an airliner en route to Los Angeles from Australia, Dr. Kayla Martin, head of the Center for Disease Control, orders the quarantine of all the passengers. But the deadly strain of this unknown virus is already spreading, and so is the panic. And now it’s a race against the clock, and across the globe, to find a cure.

programme.title: Pandemic, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Tiffani Thiessen, French Stewart, Faye Dunaway, Eric Roberts, Vincent Spano, Bob Gunton, Michael Massee When inexplicable flu-like symptoms kill a young man aboard an airliner en route to Los Angeles from Australia, Dr. Kayla Martin, head of the Center for Disease Control, orders the quarantine of all the passengers. But the deadly strain of this unknown virus is already spreading, and so is the panic. And now it’s a race against the clock, and across the globe, to find a cure.

programme.title: UFO Chronicles: Alien Detectives
programme.desc: Explore the ramifications of the alien presence on planet Earth.

programme.title: Nowhere Michigan
programme.desc: A man on the run from a brutal murder hides in the last place anyone will look for him, Michigan's frozen Upper Peninsula. When a wrong move gives him away he'll have to choose between running for his life or protecting the people he loves.

programme.title: To Tokyo
programme.desc: A young woman hiding from her past in a remote Japanese village is abducted into a fantastic wilderness and pursued by a monster through Tokyo.

programme.title: Literary Ink: A Wizard's Journey
programme.desc: Literary Ink follows four tattoo artists at the first ever wizard themed tattoo convention in the world.

programme.title: Song for Our People
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of an unforgettable recording session where an extraordinary group of artist activists come together to create a powerful new anthem to honor Black lives and inspire the fight for racial justice in America.

programme.title: The American Success Company
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man must resort to becoming a crook to make it in the business world.

programme.title: Happy New Year
programme.desc: Two outlandish crooks set out to make the score of the century.

programme.title: The Shadow Riders
programme.desc: Two brothers return home at the end of the war to find their family has been kidnapped by Confederate forces.

programme.title: Amazing Grace And Chuck
programme.desc: A little leaguer quits playing games until all nuclear weapons are disarmed. A pro basketball star joins him.

programme.title: Eat A Bowl Of Tea
programme.desc: A Chinese-American and his wife face a clash of cultures in post-WWII New York's Chinatown.

programme.title: Alvarez Kelly
programme.desc: A profiteer and cattleman plays the North and South against each other until kidnapped by a Confederate.

programme.title: The Outlaws Is Coming
programme.desc: The Three Stooges go west and get mixed-up in a battle between gunslingers and an Indian tribe.

programme.title: The Great Sioux Massacre
programme.desc: A look at what happened to Custer and his troops at the Battle of Little Big Horn.

programme.title: Land Raiders
programme.desc: A ruthless landowner uses an attack on a wagon train as an excuse to begin a war that will enable him to claim Apache territory as his own.

programme.title: The Long Riders
programme.desc: Four theatrical families of the 1980s re-create the saga of the 1860s James Gang: Stacy and James Keach, David, Keith and Robert Carradine, Randy and Dennis Quaid and Christopher and Nicholas Guest.

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Sodbusters
programme.desc: In this parody of western tropes, a mysterious stranger (Oscar nominee Kris Kristofferson, “Blade”) rolls into town to help local farmers defend their property from a land-grabbing cattle rancher.

programme.title: Goin South
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson plays Henry Moon, a third-rate outlaw, in this romantic comedy set in the 1860s.

programme.title: Lone Wolf McQuade
programme.desc: A maverick Texas Ranger throws down his guns to indulge his talents in the martial arts when he meets his match in the leader of a gun-smuggling ring.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: When a wounded man rides into Tombstone, Earp decides to arrest Old Man Clanton for stealing the man's horses.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp learns that the newspaper is run by a crooked editor who is in league with the gangs running Arizona.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp's crackdown on crime in Tombstone is causing big problems for the Clanton gang.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Clum and others want Earp to take a posse after the men he was forced to release threaten him, but Earp declines.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Fed up with Earp's interference, the head of the 10 Percent Ring in Tucson decides to kill Earp.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp is summoned to Fort Huachuca where he is told Old Man Clanton has put a claim in for $7000 of beef stolen by the Apaches.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp's friend Ned Buntline comes to Tombstone hoping Earp will introduce him to the Clantons so he can use them in a new book.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp

programme.desc: The Ten Percent Ring wants retribution for the killing of Priddy.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Convict Dobie Jenner arrives in Tombstone after being released from Yuma prison for murder. When his old mining partner George McKean sees him in town, he tells Earp to run Jenner out of town

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp

programme.desc: Marshal Fred White tries to take the pistol from a drunk Curly Bill Brocius but White's actions cause the gun to fire and he is mortally wounded.
